TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You broke one of the wires in the hijacked car and now you can't drive away in the hijacked car.

I wish to oscillate violently

Granted. You are in an SSTO with a CG behind the CoL... Good luck surviving that reentry.

I wish I had every book and CD I ever wanted.

granted, but they are all on fire

I wish 1.1 didnt replaced the old mk1 cockpit ;c
Granted. They remove it from the game. I wish for everyone to be happy forever and live forever, with no deaths EVER.

Granted. That statement only applies to our pets.

I wish for 9001% funding to space exploration.

granted, but then everything else fails

I wish people donated helicopters

Granted. They are donated to octopi, therefore air kraken happens.

I wish to be able to think of poses.

Granted. That statement only applies to our pets.

I wish for 9001% funding to space exploration.

I said everyone, that includes human.

Granted. The poses that you think of are immediately erased from your memory.

I wish for everyone to be happy forever and live forever, with no deaths EVER(includes everyone, including pets and humans).

This can not be better expressed than by this comic's last panel. ("Minus" by Ryan Armand, page 119) (slight spoiler warning, if you want, read from the beginning)

"...and don't forget our pets"

I wish I knew how to pick a door lock with a paper clip.

PS: The key is to fill the gaps with happy pills. I should have thought of that :-)

Edited August 24, 2015 by heng

This can not be better expressed than by this comic's last panel. ("Minus" by Ryan Armand, page 119) (slight spoiler warning, if you want, read from the beginning)

"...and don't forget our pets"

I wish I knew how to pick a door lock with a paper clip.

Everyone can't be happy that confined.

Granted, but when you try to do it,the paper clip explodes, blowing off your hand.

I wish I knew what to wish for.

Granted. You know to wish for diarrhea.

I wish i had a better computer.

granted, but now you got depression level 9999

I wish 1.1 was released

Granted. It's still full of bugs.

I wish to huehuehue

Granted, but I short circuit before I can grant that wish.

I wish that I had a bagel right now.

Granted. It has no hole in the middle.

I wish for a bagel with no hole in the middle.

Granted, but it's really stale.

I wish for MORE BACON!

AGAIN!

granted. special 'long pork' bacon for you

i wish my suprevisor at work gets a hemroid the size of a baby

Granted. You end up with the supervisor's workload on top of your own as they slowly recover from treatment. You don't receive any extra pay or benefits.

I wish for more rain.

Granted, your name is now "Noah"; good luck with all the animal poop in the bottom of the boat!

I wish for a longer summer

granted, its uber hot too, enought to melt people

I wish i could concentrate energy enoght to do a fus ro dah

Granted, but before you can do it you take an arrow to the knee.

I wish I was currently an adventurer, like EdusacconBR used to be.

granted, but then you take an arrow on the knee too

I wish i had the ace combat EML

Granted, but its incredibly buggy and only operates properly for 2.25 seconds before destroying itself.

I wish I had a freight train.

Granted. There are snakes on it.

I wish I had a plane...

Granted, its as long as the smallest bacteria on earth however.

I wish i had a better sabre.
